Package Stories

Class Story

java.lang.Object
Stories.Story
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Alchemy, Apparition, Charms, Creatures, Defense, Divination, Herbology, History, MagicalTheory, MuggleStudies, Potions, Quidditch, Runes, Transfiguration, Welcome
public abstract class Story extends Object implements Serializable
This is an abstract class from which other classes in this package are derived.

      public abstract void playStory(Player player) throws InterruptedException
      An abstract method to play the story.
      Parameters:
      player - the player
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - is thrown if there is a problem in Waiter class

    • ifDone

      public Boolean ifDone() throws InterruptedException
      This is a method that uses Waiter class to wait until everything in this class is done.
      Returns:
      the boolean value of done
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - is thrown if there is a problem in Waiter class

    • reload

      public Story reload() throws InstantiationException, IllegalAccessException
      This is a method to get the new instance of a class derived from Story it is called from.
      Returns:
      the new instance
      Throws:
      InstantiationException - is thrown if the new instance cannot be created
      IllegalAccessException - is thrown if the class does not have access to the details of the instance
